title: BALZAM ZA USTNICE NEGOVALNI, LIP INFUSIONS SPF15, BLISTEX, 3,7G

contact-information.kontakt:: Fraktal d.o.o., Cesta Andreja Bitenca 68, 1000 Ljubljana

ingredient-information.sestavine: Sestavine/Ingredients: hydrogenated coconut oil, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, homosalate, cera alba, phenyl trimethicone,ethylhexyl salicylate, brassica campestris/aleurites fordi oil copolymer, aroma, tocopheryl acetate, bis-diglyceryl polyacyladipate-2,C10-30 cholesterol/lanosterol esters, dimethicone, copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax, alumina, amyl cinnamal, arachidyl alcohol,arachidyl glucoside, behenyl alcohol, C12-15 alkyl benzoate, caprylic/capric triglyceride, ceramide NG, limonene, linalool,palmitoyl hexapeptide-12, phenoxyethanol, polyhydroxystearic acid, saccharin, stearic acid, tribehenin, CI 77891.
